summary: Based on real life conditions, Raul Trellez, a homeless person, goes around Bogota's streets finding ways to support his drug addiction, which leads him to wander around appreciating life from a fearless and passionate way.
cast: Abelardo Jaimes|Gala Botero|Romelia Cajiao|Amparo Atehortúa|Alexis Zúñiga
title: La sociedad del semáforo
